name: Stormy
tagline: AI agent for influencer marketing
description: Stormy is an AI agent for influencer marketing. Give it a brief + budget; it finds the right YouTube/TikTok creators from public data, scores fit, drafts/personalizes outreach, sends DMs/emails, tracks replies, and helps you negotiate to close—fast, end-to-end

name: Mirror
tagline: Deeply understand yourself and every relationship
description: Mirror unifies astrology, Human Design, MBTI, Enneagram + more into one blueprint of you. Run freakishly accurate compatibility reports. Then use Social AI to @mention friends in chat and instantly decode your connection.

name: Dualite x Supabase
tagline: Build full-stack applications with Dualite - securely
description: Dualite allows you to build and ship full-stack mobile and web applications securely by prompting. Simply describe what you want to build, and it will build it for you, all while keeping your data and sensitive keys securely.

name: TensorZero
tagline: Open-source stack for industrial-grade LLM applications
description: Build industrial-grade LLM applications: one API for every LLM, observability, optimization (prompts, models, etc.), evaluations, and A/B testing — all open source. Turn metrics and human feedback into smarter, faster, and cheaper LLMs. Get started in minutes.

name: FileFaker
tagline: Generate sample files of various types and sizes in seconds.
description: Native macOS app for instant test file generation. Create PDFs, images, videos, CSVs & more locally on your Mac. No internet needed, files never leave your device. Perfect for developers & QA testing uploads, validations, and edge cases.

name: Blink
tagline: Deep code research, straight from Slack or your browser
description: Blink is your AI coding partner for Slack, and soon, your browser. Investigate repos, draft pull requests, run tests in ephemeral environments, and chat through complex codebases. Join the waitlist to be first to try Blink’s new in-browser experience.

name: Filo Mail for  macOS
tagline: Instantly turn your Mac inbox into a to-do list
description: Filo Mail for macOS brings AI-driven productivity to your desktop inbox. Automatically extract tasks, summarize emails, and streamline workflow—so you spend less time sorting emails and more time focusing on what truly matters.

name: Autosana
tagline: QA Agent for Mobile Apps
description: Autosana connects directly to your repo(s), embeds into your CI/CD, creates end-to-end testing with natural language, and reports failures and bugs directly to you and your team. Slash deployment times & catch bugs before users do.

name: Gitmore
tagline: The first AI-powered reporting tool for git repositories
description: AI-powered Git reporting automation. Connect GitHub & Bitbucket for smart reporting, and get your team progress insights easily.

name: Extra Thursday
tagline: Fly through your inbox just by talking
description: Meet Thursday, your voice-powered email manager that flies through your inbox. Speak your thoughts and watch it triage, draft, follow-up with your most important threads and leads in seconds. Finally—you can work at the speed of thought and speech.

name: RealRoots
tagline: We guarantee women new friends in her city
description: This is where real friendships begin. RealRoots will match you for small, guided hangouts. We plan, you show up. Fun events, guided conversations, and an AI coach keep it easy - friendship guaranteed.

name: CarbonRunner
tagline: Shift AI training & CI/CD to the lowest carbon regions!
description: Shifting compute like AI training, CI/CD pipelines to data centers in the lowest-carbon regions for a 90% reduction in CO2. Running across multiple clouds (AWS, Azure and GCP), we use live grid data to shift workloads where emissions are lowest and cheapest

name: Deeptracker
tagline: AI-powered investment insights and strategy platform
description: Deeptracker is the world’s first native AI research platform built for professionals who seek signals, not noise. From company events to supply chain disruptions and policy shifts, Deeptracker helps you track, verify, and act—before the market reacts.

name: Hyperpod
tagline: AI models to apps, fast
description: Serverless Infrastructure for AI Applications. No VMs, No DevOps. 3x Faster than Baseten, Cerebrium & Lightning AI at a fraction of the cost.

name: Renderly AI
tagline: Bring architecture to life in minutes.
description: Transform sketches into stunning photorealistic renders with advanced AI. Create professional-quality interiors, exteriors, landscaping, custom boards, and video fly-throughs in minutes, perfect for architects, designers, builders, and homeowners.

name: Secria
tagline: Post-quantum secure email, private by design
description: Secria is the best encrypted email. Prevent phishing & spam, verify senders, and protect your inbox with post-quantum encryption. Sign up for free today!

name: OkkProxy
tagline: OKKProxy  is a trusted proxy  provider.
description: OkkProxy delivers premium residential, ISP, and datacenter proxies with exclusive IPs. Built for web scraping, SEO, and more — fast, scalable, and easy to use.

name: LinkIntel
tagline: AI-Powered LinkedIn analytics dashboard for company pages
description: Upload your LinkedIn analytics exports and discover powerful insights that LinkedIn’s native analytics don’t show you. Get full control of your data with competitor benchmarking, content performance tracking, and audience insights—all in one dashboard.

name: D.Waste
tagline: AI-powered real-time waste audits for schools & institutions
description: DWaste replaces slow, error-prone audits with AI-powered real-time waste identification. It enables accurate sorting, automated reports, and insights helping schools save time, engage communities, and achieve sustainability goals

name: onbalance
tagline: Cashflow planning for e'neurs who value trust and privacy
description: Free cash flow planning app for solopreneurs and small business owners who value trust and privacy. Confidentiality by design with end-to-end encryption, fluent UI, local-first, and mobile-native. On-the-go finance management is finally made right.
